get.summary: Get All Clock Records
get.description: Retrieve all clock-in and clock-out records with optional filters and pagination. Can filter by department and specify a date range.

parameters.name: export
parameters.description: Flag to export the clock records. If set to true, the response will be an export file.

parameters.name: from_day
parameters.description: Start date for the date range filter. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. If not provided, defaults to the 26th of the previous month.

parameters.name: to_day
parameters.description: End date for the date range filter. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. If not provided, defaults to the 26th of the current month.

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving clock records.

post.description: Allows a user to clock in at home or site based on location type. When clocking in at a site, latitude and longitude of the user's location is compared with the site's location.

clock_in.description: The clock-in time in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format

latitude.description: User's latitude when clocking in at a site

longitude.description: User's longitude when clocking in at a site

400.description: Validation error or user already clocked in

post.description: Allows a user to clock out from either home or site. If clocking out from a site, latitude and longitude are required.

clock_out.description: The clock-out time in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format

latitude.description: User's latitude when clocking out at a site

longitude.description: User's longitude when clocking out at a site

400.description: Validation error or user is not clocked in

post.description: Allows HR to update an existing clock entry for a specific user. The request body should include updated clock information.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose clock is being updated

parameters.name: clock
parameters.description: The ID of the clock entry to update

clock_in.description: The updated clock-in time in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format

clock_out.description: The updated clock-out time in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format

location_id.description: The location ID if the location_type is 'site'

message.example: No clocks found for this user.

post.summary: HR Clock In for a User
post.description: Allows HR to clock in on behalf of a user, with conditional location fields based on the location type ('site' or 'home').

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The ID of the user HR is clocking in for

clock_in.description: The clock-in time in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format

location_id.description: The location ID if clocking in at a site

400.description: Validation error or user has an existing clock-in without clocking out

message.example: You already have an existing clock-in without clocking out.

get.summary: Get Users Who Clocked In or Didn't Clock In on a Specific Day
get.description: Retrieves a list of users who either did not clock in or clocked in on a specific day.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to check users for, in 'Y-m-d' format. Defaults to today's date if not provided.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of users to retrieve: 'clocked_in' for users who clocked in, 'no_clock_in' for users who did not clock in. Defaults to 'no_clock_in'.

message.example: Users who didn't clock in on this day
